bibl.title: A New Paneion at Mons Porphyrites.
bibl.note: Black porphyry stela, found on the 15th March 1995 (Mons Porphyrites Project sponsored by the Egypt Exploration Society, second season of survey). Picture of Pan-Min and Greek dedication of a Paneion by Caius Cominius Leugas, the Roman discoverer of Mons Porphyrites, 23rd July, A.D. 18.
VAN RENGEN Wilfried, A New Paneion at Mons Porphyrites.
